title: Linux 115.1esr  popup/ephemeral windows not working correctly under TWM window manager
content:
Just being a 'user' , this is simply to report (and hopefully get it all working again) to the greater good on here and at Mozilla, that popup/ephemeral windows , or whatever they are called, in the 115esr release no longer function correctly (they did with the previous versions) with TWM window manager in this experience.

When clicking on a tool bar icon that launches a 'popup' type window, or in forms using 'drop down' controls for example, as soon as mouse moves over the popup or the popup gets focus, the popup gets closed immediately; it does not stay around to enough to allow a selection or whatever, as it should.

If one can 'tab' into a popup and use the keyboard (keyboard focus so to speak), then it is possible to access some options. The keyboard focus does not seem to cause an immediate close like the mouse does (as above).

As an aside, Chromium suffers the same now

It is something mouse related it seems and with how it all works with TWM - which is old, but as said, there was not a problem previously so whats changed in this version of Firefox browser to introduce this 'bug'.

Peace and best wishes to all Habs
creator: habsbc

title: Latest Firefox version causing large number of Virus warnings
content:
The latest version installed and is issuing many virus warning messages whenever I start Firefox. It keeps telling me to activate my virus software but it is already running and I have done scans to try to verify my system but all seems well. I have also booted my system from a virus recovery CD (created on a separate system) and scanned my hard disks, again all was clean. I have attached a screenshot of two of the messages for you to see. I have installed Chrome to try and see what is happening but, although it does not issue and messages, it seems to have problems too? Microsoft Edge seems to work OK but I hate it. Please help?

Kind regards, Chris Griffin
creator: griffinster

title: I recently changed computers and all my data is gone
content: Hi, I recently changed computers and all my data is gone, no bookmarks, settings, history, nothing. Is there a way to know if firefox made a new account using the same email that i used before? Are firefox settings and bookmarks stored on the account? Please help everything is gone and i have no idea how to fix it.
creator: dudecosper

title: Very low volume on video playback
content: I am running Firefox on Mint Debian edition, I find the Youtube playback very low volume preset at about 1/4 of max, I try set it to the max but it returned the same after restart. I start FF in trouble shooting mode to disable theme and extension but didn't change thing, I remove and reinstall FF also did not help. I find something strange that, on the Help menu it said the updates disabled by system administrator but I did not do that, it is now on 116.0 64bits, any comment ?
creator: bilmenot

title: No Save As Dialogue Appearing
content:
Since the FF update to 116.0.2 (64-bit) I am unable to save images from a very specific part of Ancestry.com. The database is the U.S., School Yearbooks, 1900-2016. All of the other image databases on Ancestry download without issue, and I am able to download the Yearbook images using Edge, so this appears to be a Firefox issue, especially as it began immediately following the most recent update.

The Yearbook images do differ from the others in that you are given an option to download two images as a zip file, or just a single image, but neither option results in the Save As dialogue appearing, and the images do not download anywhere.

This is a very strange issue, but maybe someone familiar with the most recent update could have some insight as to what has been changed that might have this impact.

Windows 11 Version 22H2 (OS Build 22621.2134), if that makes any difference.
creator: geoear

title: Couldn't load XPCOM
content: firefox可能正在更新，我删除了updated文件夹，之前也删除过，是没有事情的，但这次删除以后，当下没问题，第二天电脑打开就打不开火狐了

title: Firefox travando na página do E-Saj do TJSP
content: Utilizo somente o Firefox, para tudo. Porém, há uns dias, o site do TJSP (e-Saj), passou a trabalhar com um certo "delay": ao entrar na pesquisa de processo, após digitar o número, o site demora a retornar e entrar no processo desejado. Está acontecendo no firefox e depois, ao testar, verifiquei o mesmo problema no Edge. Somente não Chrome não está assim e, em razão disso, para trabalhar com o e-Saj (fico muitas horas), estou fazendo somente no Chrome. Não sei a razão do "bug". Utilizo kaspersky (sem o salvador de chaves) e W10 Pro.
creator: pinheiro_adv

title: My synced account tab disappeared??
content:
My synced accounts tab disappeared

I have 2 devices that are linked to my account, a new one and an old one, because the CPU of my old computer is broken, I can only open the tabs on my old computer through my new computer, after a month those tabs that linked to my old computer are all gone. I haven't opened my tab on the old computer in a while and haven't unlinked it, what happened??? How do I open it again???

I have the hard drive of my old computer, and I can access it on my new computer, where are the data/file of my old computer's tabs that were being opened?? (not bookmark)
creator: michael19951216

title: Como desativar o fade in e fade out em tela cheia no youtube do firefox
content: Como desativar o fade in e fade out em tela cheia no youtube do firefox? Quando se abre o modo de tela cheia do YouTube surge uma tela preta que leva um tempo considerável até iniciar o vídeo o mesmo acontece quando encerra o modo tela cheia.
